Today In #DepecheMode History: Album Release - Speak & Spell, UK (1981). I take pictures, _____________ pictures (fill in the blank)

Today In #DepecheMode History: Single Release - It's Called A Heart, UK (1985).  To celebrate, go play the Slow Mix. ;)
